Data Visualization of Energy Usage

Disclaimer: By answering the following questions, you are participating in a study being performed by computer scientists in the Williams College Computer Science Department. If you have questions about this research, please contact Jeannie Albrecht at jeannie@cs.williams.edu. Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline to answer any or all of the following questions. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.

Please only complete this HIT once. You will not be paid for retakes. If you have already completed this HIT or any other version of this HIT and submit it again, all submissions but the first will be rejected, and you will only be paid for the first submission. Having a submission rejected is detrimental to your reputation as a worker, and may prevent you from completing HITs in the future.

In this study, you will be shown an image that contains two hexagons. For each image, please analyze the image displayed and judge which hexagon is utilizing the most energy in this image. Please only consider the color of each hexagon in the image, and not the size of the actual image, or the size of the individual hexagons in the image. Please try your best to judge each hexagon independently of the other hexagons. Please do this experiment in one sitting, without taking any breaks.

Technical requirements:

  • This experiment will only work in Firefox version 20 or higher, Chrome version 25 or higher, Safari version 5 or higher, or Internet Explorer version 10 or higher.
    Your browser is incompatible with this HIT. Please use a different browser.
  • Please allow permission for Javascript to run on this site and disable any script blockers that are running.

Data Visualization of Energy Usage

Color test:

Examine the colored plates and enter the numbers written in them in the text boxes below. If you do not see any number in a plate, type "none" in its corresponding text box.


Demographic Information

Please help us out by answering the following questions about yourself. You must answer all of the questions marked with an asterisk (*).

*What is your gender?

*How old are you?

*Which of the following best describes your highest achieved education level?

*What country are you from?
